completed_features: Create the `lib/data.ts` file containing an array of mock car objects adhering to the `Car` interface defined in `lib/types.ts`.

It needs to accept props for `children`, `onClick`, `variant` (e.g., default, outline, ghost), and `size` (e.g., default, sm, lg) to ensure flexibility across the application.
